import { useState } from "react" export const ChangeName = ({setNameClick}) =>{ const localPokeUser = localStorage.getItem("pokefile_user") const pokeUserObject = JSON.parse(localPokeUser) const [chosenPokemon, setChosenPokemon] = useState([]) const [newName, setNewName] = useState([]) useEffect(() =>{ fetch(`http://localhost:8088/pokemonPicks?userId=${pokeUserObject.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then ((data) =>{ setChosenPokemon(data)})}) return<>
{/*
*/}
